text: Besak, on ci sumo maro ʙa ʙuthojaton da'vat mekuned, na haqqi da'vat dar dunjo dorand va na dar oxirat va alʙatta, ʙozgasti mo ʙa sui Allohi ʙarhaq ast va U har jak amalkunandaro muvofiqi amalas cazoi munosiʙ medihad va hatman, isrofkorone, ki ʙo kufru gunoh va xunreziho az andoza ʙerun raftand, dar cahannam ʙosand
